# sec_identity_create_with_certificates(_:_:) | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Security ](/documentation/security)

- [ sec_identity_create_with_certificates(_:_:) ](/documentation/Security/sec_identity_create_with_certificates(_:_:))

-  sec_identity_create_with_certificates(_:_:) 

Function# sec_identity_create_with_certificates(_:_:)

iOS 12.0+iPadOS 12.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.14+tvOS 12.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 5.0+

```
func sec_identity_create_with_certificates(
    _ identity: SecIdentity,
    _ certificates: CFArray
) -> sec_identity_t?
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/Security/sec_identity_create_with_certificates(_:_:)#parameters)

`identity`A `SecIdentityRef` instance.

`certificates`An array of `SecCertificateRef` instances.

## [Return Value](/documentation/Security/sec_identity_create_with_certificates(_:_:)#return-value)

A `sec_identity_t` instance.

## [Discussion](/documentation/Security/sec_identity_create_with_certificates(_:_:)#discussion)

Create an ARC-able `sec_identity_t` instance from a `SecIdentityRef` and array of SecCertificateRef instances.
